data.message: Hey ! I wana to verify my page please tell me the process?

replies.message: Hi Emi. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1p7ZYXt. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1UeyRWs. -Kate
